cofh.lib.block

Interface IDismantleable

  • All Superinterfaces:
    net.minecraftforge.common.extensions.IForgeBlock
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CrossoverRailBlock, CrossoverRailBlockWL, DetectorRailBlockCoFH, DetectorRailBlockWL, HardenedGlassBlock, PoweredRailBlockCoFH, PoweredRailBlockWL, RailBlockCoFH, RailBlockWL, TileBlock4Way, TileBlock6Way, TileBlockActive, TileBlockActive4Way, TileBlockActive6Way, TileBlockCell, TileBlockCoFH, TileBlockDynamo

    public interface IDismantleable
extends net.minecraftforge.common.extensions.IForgeBlock
    Implemented on Blocks which have some method of being instantly dismantled.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default boolean canDismantle(net.minecraft.world.World world, net.minecraft.util.math.BlockPos pos, net.minecraft.block.BlockState state, net.minecraft.entity.player.PlayerEntity player)
      Return true if the block can be dismantled.
      default void dismantleBlock(net.minecraft.world.World world, net.minecraft.util.math.BlockPos pos, net.minecraft.block.BlockState state, net.minecraft.util.math.RayTraceResult target, net.minecraft.entity.player.PlayerEntity player, boolean returnDrops)
      Dismantles the block.

      • Methods inherited from interface net.minecraftforge.common.extensions.IForgeBlock

        addDestroyEffects, addHitEffects, addLandingEffects, addRunningEffects, canBeReplacedByLeaves, canBeReplacedByLogs, canConnectRedstone, canCreatureSpawn, canDropFromExplosion, canEntityDestroy, canHarvestBlock, canStickTo, canSustainPlant, catchFire, collisionExtendsVertically, createTileEntity, getAiPathNodeType, getBeaconColorMultiplier, getBedDirection, getBedSpawnPosition, getBlock, getEnchantPowerBonus, getExpDrop, getExplosionResistance, getFireSpreadSpeed, getFlammability, getFogColor, getHarvestLevel, getHarvestTool, getLightValue, getPickBlock, getSlipperiness, getSoundType, getStateAtViewpoint, getTags, getToolModifiedState, getWeakChanges, hasTileEntity, isAir, isBed, isBurning, isConduitFrame, isFertile, isFireSource, isFlammable, isLadder, isPortalFrame, isScaffolding, isSlimeBlock, isStickyBlock, isToolEffective, observedNeighborChange, onBlockExploded, onNeighborChange, onPlantGrow, removedByPlayer, rotate, setBedOccupied, shouldCheckWeakPower, shouldDisplayFluidOverlay

    • Method Detail

      • dismantleBlock

        default void dismantleBlock(net.minecraft.world.World world,
                            net.minecraft.util.math.BlockPos pos,
                            net.minecraft.block.BlockState state,
                            net.minecraft.util.math.RayTraceResult target,
                            net.minecraft.entity.player.PlayerEntity player,
                            boolean returnDrops)
        Dismantles the block. If returnDrops is true, the drop(s) should be placed into the player's inventory.

      • canDismantle

        default boolean canDismantle(net.minecraft.world.World world,
                             net.minecraft.util.math.BlockPos pos,
                             net.minecraft.block.BlockState state,
                             net.minecraft.entity.player.PlayerEntity player)
        Return true if the block can be dismantled. The criteria for this is entirely up to the block.
